Dear friend and my good President

As it has not come to the Printing House at a more opportune time, such as the taking of Ca√ßapava today, and I must put the capital applied for this into some turnover to support my family; I consult Your Excellency

From Your Excellency, most affectionate and obliged friend, Piratini, June 6, 1837. Almeida.
